title: How to Locate the Model and Serial Number on an Ice Maker

steps.title: Standalone ice maker.
steps.content: Standalone ice maker. If you have a Whirlpool countertop or upright ice maker, you'll find its model number on one of the inside walls (usually the left side) of the ice maker.

steps.title: An icemaker inside your refrigerator.
steps.content: An icemaker inside your refrigerator. To service or replace the icemaker inside your Whirlpool freezer, you'll need the model number from your refrigerator. To find it, look for a sticker on the inside wall of the refrigerator compartment. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Standalone ice makers.
steps.content: Standalone ice makers. Your KitchenAid's model number can be found in one of three locations. The sticker that displays the model and serial number could be in any of these locations: On the rear of the unit toward the top of the ice maker. On many under-counter and standalone ice makers, you'll find the model number inside the door on the right side of the ice tub's interior. [2] X Research source Behind the front panel, which is common with larger ice makers.

steps.title: An icemaker inside your refrigerator.
steps.content: An icemaker inside your refrigerator. If you have a KitchenAid refrigerator and freezer with a built-in icemaker, you'll need the refrigerator's model number instead. The model and serial numbers for your KitchenAid refrigerator are inside the refrigerator on the left wall. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Your NewAir ice maker's model number is on the back of the unit.
steps.content: Your NewAir ice maker's model number is on the back of the unit. Just turn your ice maker around to find a sticker near the top of the unit's rear side. This sticker contains the model number, serial number, amperage, and other details about the ice maker.

steps.title: The location of your ice maker's model number varies.
steps.content: The location of your ice maker's model number varies. You'll always find the model and serial number on the rating plate, which you'll find in one of these locations: On some GE ice makers, you'll find the model number inside the ice storage area. Just open the door and check the right and left sides of the inner wall for a sticker or plate containing model and serial information. [4] X Research source On GE Profile nugget ice makers, the model number, serial number, and rating information is on the back of the unit. On larger GE nugget ice makers, the model number is on the top of the ice maker.

steps.title: Standalone ice maker.
steps.content: Standalone ice maker. If you're using a Frigidaire countertop ice maker, including nugget ice makers, the model and serial numbers are on a sticker or plate on the inner wall of the ice compartment. You may need to remove the tray to find it.

steps.title: An ice maker in your refrigerator.
steps.content: An ice maker in your refrigerator. If you need to replace or get support for the ice maker in your Frigidaire refrigerator, you'll need the refrigerator's model number. You can then use that model number to find the right parts and service for your ice maker. Depending on your Frigidaire product, you may find the model number: Inside the refrigerator or freezer door. On the inside wall of the refrigerator or freezer. On the wall behind the crisper drawer(s) inside the refrigerator. Behind the kickplate, which is the bar that extends over the bottom of the refrigerator.

steps.title: You'll find the model number on the exterior of the ice maker.
steps.content: You'll find the model number on the exterior of the ice maker. Depending on the model, the sticker will either be on the front of the ice maker to the right of the door, or on the rear of the icemaker close to the top of the unit. The serial number will also be on this sticker. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Check the back of your Follett ice maker to find the model number.
steps.content: Check the back of your Follett ice maker to find the model number. You'll usually find the sticker on the rear of the icemaker toward the top of the unit. If you don't see it, the model number also appears in your Follett manual and any paperwork you've received with your ice maker.

steps.title: To find the model number, inspect the back of the unit.
steps.content: To find the model number, inspect the back of the unit. You'll typically find a sticker that clearly displays the model and serial number of your Vevor ice maker on the upper-left corner of the machine. The model number is also printed on the front of your Vevor manual.

steps.title: The model number is on the rear of your Hoshizaki ice maker.
steps.content: The model number is on the rear of your Hoshizaki ice maker. On the top-left corner of your Hoshizaki's back side, you'll find a plate that contains the model number, serial number, and other helpful information.
